hopobject.name: opensmartmeter
hopobject.body: Project created as completion of course work for college Gurgacz Assis Brazil. Using the board Beaglebone converters and brand Microchip, is read the values ​​of voltage, current and power of the three powers, as well as automating the reading of electricity. Novelty in developing countries like Brazil.
hopobject.shortdesc: Project of a Smart Meter, ready for Smart Grid Systems, for measurement of electricity consumption.
